1.どこからか 声が聞こえてくる……。: I hear voices coming from somewhere...

2.<center>余は 第７代ウルベア皇帝ボラングムニス。|そなたは 王者の座を目: I am Borang Muniz, 7th Emperor of Urbea. You|are the one who aspires to Champ's Seat.

3.<center>余は 三闘士のハンマーを|つねに 手元に置くことで 守ってきた。: I have always protected the Triad Hammer by|keeping it close at hand. That's right. Even|now that I've passed away.

4.<center>だが それも今日までのこと……。|王者の座を目指せし者よ。|三闘: But that was only until today... you who|aspire to Champ's Seat. I now bestow upon you|the Triad Hammer.

6.<center>かつて 大いなる災いが この地を襲いし時|我らドワーフの民は 他: Once, when a great calamity struck our land,|our Dwarf people fought and died before other|species...

7.<center>だが それは 無駄死にではない。|ドワーフたちの屍が築いた道は|: But it was not a death in vain. For the paths|that the corpses of the Dwarfs built|eventually became the paths of champions.

8.<center>……これで 余の役目も終わった。|ウルベアの民の待つ場所へと還れ: Now my work is done. I can return to the place|where the people of Urbea await me. Farewell.|Farewell, Champ's Seat.

9.「おお <pc>よ。| 三闘士のハンマーと 三闘士のオノを| ついに その手にし: Oh, <pc>. I see that you have at last|taken the Triad Hammer and the Triad Axe into|your hands.

10.「……ほう。古代ウルベアの皇帝は| 死後も 三闘士のハンマーを| 守り続けていた: ...Oh. I understand that the Emperor of|ancient Urbea kept the Triad Hammer even after|his death...

11.「おお……今は亡き ウルベアの皇帝よ。| そなたの思い。同じく国を治める者として: Oh ... now deceased Emperor of Urbea. Your|thoughts. As a man who ruled a country, I|understand your feelings...

12.「……<pc>よ。| じつは わしも ウルベアの皇帝と同じなのだ。: <pc>. As a matter of fact, I am like|the Emperor of Urbea.

13.「いずれ 災厄が 世界を襲ったとき| 王者の座を目指す者が 三闘士の盾を求め|:
I grew up being told that when the time came|for disaster to strike the world, those who|sought Champ's Seat would arise to claim the|
|Triad Shield.

14.「国王となったとき わしは 命に代えても| この盾を守ると誓いを立て 以来| 片: When I became king, I swore an oath to protect|this shield even at the cost of my life, and I|have worn it ever since.

15.「では <pc>よ。| この三闘士の盾を そなたに授けようぞ！: Then, <pc>. I bestow upon you this|Triad Shield!

17.「三闘の神殿の入り口は ラニアッカ断層帯の| オノの祭壇 ハンマーの祭壇 そして:
The entrance to the Triad Temple is said to be|at the Triad Altar, surrounded by the Axe|Altar, Hammer Altar, and Shield Altar in the|
|Raniakka Fault Zone.

18.「三闘士の神器を持ち その祭壇を訪れれば| 必ずや 三闘の神殿の入り口が開く！: If you carry the 3 Battles Altar and visit it,|you will surely open the entrance to the Triad|Temple!

19.「三闘士のハンマーと盾は 古代から伝わるもの。| 時代を経て かなり 傷んでおる: Triad Hammer and Shield have been handed down|since ancient times. They have been damaged by|time. This will be the last of their kind.

20.「見事 王者の盾を手に入れたならば| わしのもとへ 戻ってきてほしい。| 頼んだ: If you received the Champion Shield with|distinction, come back to me. I ask you,|<pc>!

22.<cs_pchero>の持っている|三闘士のオノ 三闘士のハンマー 三闘士の盾が: The Triad Axe, Triad Hammer, and Triad Shield|held by <cs_pchero> began to shake as if in|resonance.

23.三闘士のハンマーと 三闘士の盾は|ボロボロに 崩れ去ってしまった……。: Triad Hammer and Triad Shield crumbled to|tatters...

24.<cs_pchero>のもとに 天から|光に包まれた武具が 降りてきた。: Armaments wrapped in light came down from the|heavens to <cs_pchero>.
